#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    long long t,n,k,a[100001],i,j,max;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
       cin>>n>>k;
       max=-1;
       for(i=0;i<k;i++)
       {
          cin>>a[i];
          if(a[i]>max)
            max=a[i];}
            j=1;
            for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
            {
              j=(j*i)%max;}
              cout<<j<<endl;
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
